repos_data.description: An open-source, self-hostable PaaS alternative to Vercel, Heroku & Netlify that lets you easily deploy static sites, databases, full-stack applications and 280+ one-click services on your own servers.

React Flow |¬†Svelte Flow - Powerful open source libraries for building node-based UIs with React (https://reactflow.dev) or Svelte (https://svelteflow.dev). Ready out-of-the-box and infinitely customizable.

‚ö° Write Native with TypeScript ‚ú® Best of all worlds (TypeScript, Swift, Objective C, Kotlin, Java, Dart). Use what you love ‚ù§Ô∏è Angular, React, Solid, Svelte, Vue with: iOS (UIKit, SwiftUI), Android (View, Jetpack Compose), Flutter and you name it compatible.

tsParticles - Easily create highly customizable JavaScript particles effects, confetti explosions and fireworks animations and use them as animated backgrounds for your website. Ready to use components available for React.js, Vue.js (2.x and 3.x), Angular, Svelte, jQuery, Preact, Inferno, Solid, Riot and Web Components.
Business intelligence as code: build fast, interactive data visualizations in SQL and markdown
A web interface for chatting with Alpaca through llama.cpp. Fully dockerized, with an easy to use API.

An intuitive spreadsheet-like interface that lets users of all technical skill levels view, edit, query, and collaborate on Postgres data directly‚Äî100% open source and self hosted, with native Postgres access control.
JavaScript event calendar. Modern alternative to fullcalendar and react-big-calendar.
‚ö° A curated list of awesome Svelte resources
Open source, self-hostable watched list for all your content (movies, tv series, anime, games) with user authentication, modern and clean UI and a very simple setup.
In-page HTTP controller for frontend development. Intercept, modify, and simulate API responses directly in the browser.
QA-Pilot is an interactive chat project that leverages online/local LLM for rapid understanding and navigation of GitHub code repository.
A framework-agnostic state management library that keeps your app‚Äôs state clean and simple. It uses a fine-grained state model, breaking state into independent, manageable chunks.
A file manager built using Svelte and Wails. It has hotkeys that are modal just like Vim and NeoVim.
